query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS article_meta_desc_tests (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  articleSlug VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  articleType VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'magazine',
  variantKey VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  metaDescription VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  isControl BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  isActive BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  impressions INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  clicks INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  totalReadTime INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  totalScrollDepth INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  completions INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_slug_variant (articleSlug, variantKey)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS article_meta_desc_assignments (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  articleSlug VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  variantKey VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  visitorId VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  referrerSource VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT NULL,
  clicked BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  readTimeSeconds INT DEFAULT 0,
  scrollDepthPercent INT DEFAULT 0,
  completed BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_slug_visitor (articleSlug, visitorId)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS article_meta_desc_tests (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  articleSlug VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  articleType VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'magazine',
  variantKey VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  metaDescription VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  isControl BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  isActive BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  impressions INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  clicks INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  totalReadTime INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  totalScrollDepth INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  completions INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_slug_variant (articleSlug, variantKey)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS article_meta_desc_assignments (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  articleSlug VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  variantKey VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  visitorId VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  referrerSource VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT NULL,
  clicked BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  readTimeSeconds INT DEFAULT 0,
  scrollDepthPercent INT DEFAULT 0,
  completed BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_slug_visitor (articleSlug, visitorId)
);
